content:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "strict": true,
    "useUnknownInCatchVariables": true,
    "allowJs": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "noEmit": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "module": "NodeNext",
    "target": "ESNext",
    "moduleResolution": "NodeNext",
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "incremental": true,
    "declaration": true,
    "newLine": "lf",
    "baseUrl": ".",
    "rootDir": ".",
    "outDir": "dist"
  },
  "exclude": ["**/node_modules", "**/.*/"]
}
